text: Gnégnéri Yaya Touré (born 13 May 1983) is an Ivorian professional football coach and former player who played as a midfielder. He is currently an assistant coach for the Saudi Arabia national team. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League League League National
